nodes.text: Xenomedicine was the study and practice of medicine involving alien species. The Journal of Xenomedicine was a notable publication on the subject of xenomedicine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Xenomedicine was first mentioned in the conversation "Opportunity Knocks" with Doc, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. In the conversation, Doc mentions xenomedicine while discussing the Journal of Xenomedicine.
